text: Eqva Ba#vatyaqgnayE&nna#patayE purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqdyaHkAqmayEqtAnna#patiH syAqmityaqgni-mEqvAnna#patiq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa Eqvainaqmanna#patiM karOqtyanna#patirEqva Ba#vatyaqgnayEq pava#mAnAya purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEdaqgnayE# pAvaqkAyAqgnayEq Suca#yEq jyOgA#mayAvIq yadaqgnayEq pava#mAnAya niqrvapa#ti prAqNamEqvAsmiqn tEna# dadhAtiq yadaqgnayE# - [  ]  16
